items.text: Wolves are the biggest wild dogs in the family, with cool features like less pointy ears and a long, bushy tail!
Did you know there are over thirty types of wolves? Some of them are even related to our furry friends, the dogs!
Wolves can have fur in all sorts of colors, like white, brown, grey, and black—perfect for blending into their surroundings!
